properties.Calificaciones_select_columns_and_remove:
SELECT
    anyo,
    evaluacion,
    contenido AS moduloId,
    curso AS cursoId,
    alumno AS alumnoId,
    MAX(nota_numerica) AS nota_numerica
FROM FLOWFILE
GROUP BY
    anyo,
    evaluacion,
    contenido,
    curso,
    alumno
LIMIT 3

properties.SQL:
SELECT
    anyo as anyo,
    curso as cursoId,
    codigo as moduloId
FROM FLOWFILE limit 3

Log level when file not found.name: Log level when file not found

properties.SQL:
SELECT
    t1.anyo as anyo,
    t4.codigo AS cursoId,
    t1.nombre_cas AS familia,
    t2.nombre_cas AS grado,
    t3.nombre_cas AS modulo,
    t4.nombre_cas AS curso
FROM FLOWFILE t1
LEFT JOIN FLOWFILE t2 ON TRIM(t2.padre) = CAST(t1.codigo AS VARCHAR)
LEFT JOIN FLOWFILE t3 ON TRIM(t3.padre) = CAST(t2.codigo AS VARCHAR)
LEFT JOIN FLOWFILE t4 ON TRIM(t4.padre) = CAST(t3.codigo AS VARCHAR)
WHERE (t1.padre IS NULL OR TRIM(t1.padre) = '') and t4.codigo IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(t4.padre) <> '' and t1.anyo IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(t1.anyo) <> ''

properties.SQL Query:
REPLACE INTO analisis.modulos (anyo, moduloId, cursoId, familia, grado, modulo, curso)
SELECT
    m.anyo,
    m.moduloId,
    m.cursoId,
    c.familia,
    c.grado,
    c.modulo,
    c.curso
FROM
    analisis.modulos_tmp m
LEFT JOIN
    analisis.cursos_tmp c ON m.anyo = c.anyo AND m.cursoId = c.cursoId

properties.Alu_Limpios:
SELECT 
    anyo,
    NIA AS alumnoId,
    MAX(fecha_nac) AS fecha_nacimiento,
    MAX(nacionalidad) AS nacionalidadId,
    MAX(sexo) AS sexo,
    MAX(cod_postal) AS cod_postal,
    MAX(provincia) AS provinciaId,
    MAX(municipio) AS municipioId,
    MAX(localidad) AS localidadId,
    MAX(estado_matricula) AS estado_matricula,
    MAX(curso) AS curso,
    MAX(grupo) AS grupo,
    MAX(turno) AS turno
FROM FLOWFILE
GROUP BY anyo, NIA
LIMIT 3

properties.SQL Query:
INSERT INTO analisis.log (tipo, grupo, procesador, mensaje) 
VALUES (${TIPO}, 'CALIFICACIONES', ${PROCESADOR}, ${MENSAJE});
